bibl.title: P.Cornell inv. 69 Revisited: A Collection of Geometrical Problems.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: P. Cornell Inv. 69 recto (= M.-P.3 2317; LDAB 7092). Reads a frequently recurring abbreviation as κα(ταλείπεται) instead of βά(ϊον) and suggests a conjectural restoration of a large part of the text.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Cornell Inv. 69 recto = P. Bagnall 35
Alexander Jones, P.Cornell inv. 69 Revisited: A Collection of Geometrical Problems.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 159-175, 5 figg., 3 fac-sim.
P. Cornell Inv. 69 recto (= M.-P.3 2317; LDAB 7092). Reads a frequently recurring abbreviation as κα(ταλείπεται) instead of βά(ϊον) and suggests a conjectural restoration of a large part of the text.
